name: cfop-cube-solver-web
description: Interactive 3D Rubik's Cube solver using CFOP method with WebAssembly and Three.js

scripts.build: echo 'Static site - no build step needed'
scripts.build:wasm: em++ ../Web.cpp ../Cube/*.cpp ../Solver/*.cpp ../Util/*.cpp --bind -o js/cube/solver/cube-solver.js -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='CubeSolverModule' -I../Cube -I../Solver -I../Util --closure 1 -O3
scripts.build:wasm:dev: em++ ../Web.cpp ../Cube/*.cpp ../Solver/*.cpp ../Util/*.cpp --bind -o js/cube/solver/cube-solver.js -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS='["ccall", "cwrap"]' -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='CubeSolverModule' -I../Cube -I../Solver -I../Util -g
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating WebAssembly module...' && node -e "import('./js/cube/solver/cube-solver.js').then(() => console.log('âœ“ WASM module is valid'))"

author: Chintan Lad <your-email@example.com>
